trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Disponibiliza dados para o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: ComponentChangedEventArgs provides data for a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: ComponentChangedEventArgs fornece dados de um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged>eventos.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged> event notifies the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService> and registered event handlers that a particular component in the currently active document has been changed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged>eventos notifica o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService>e registado processadores de eventos que foi alterado num componente em particular o documento atualmente ativos.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged>

trans-unit.source: A ComponentChangedEventArgs provides the following information: - A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs.Component%2A> property that indicates the component that was modified.
trans-unit.target: Um ComponentChangedEventArgs fornece as seguintes informações: - um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs.Component%2A>propriedade que indica o componente que foi modificado.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs.Component%2A>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs.Member%2A> property that indicates the member that was changed.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs.Member%2A>propriedade que indica o membro que foi alterado.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs.Member%2A>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs.NewValue%2A> property that indicates the new value of the member.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs.NewValue%2A>propriedade que indica o novo valor do membro.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs.NewValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: - An <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs.OldValue%2A> property that indicates the old value of the member.
trans-unit.target: -Um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs.OldValue%2A>propriedade que indica o valor antigo do membro.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs.OldValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Component designers typically raise the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged> event automatically when components are added, removed, or modified.
trans-unit.target: Designers componente normalmente elevar o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged>eventos automaticamente quando os componentes são adicionados, removidas ou modificadas.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged> event is not raised during form load and unload because changes at this time are expected.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged>o evento não é gerado durante o carregamento do formulário e descarregamento porque as alterações neste momento, são esperadas.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged>

trans-unit.source: A component designer might raise the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged> event after it changes a property of the component; this ensures that the Properties window will display the updated property.
trans-unit.target: Um designer de componente pode aumentar a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged>eventos depois altera uma propriedade do componente; isso garante que a janela Propriedades apresentará a propriedade atualizada.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The designer for a component calls this constructor after it has changed a property of the component.
trans-unit.target: O estruturador para um componente chama este construtor depois de ter sofrido alterações uma propriedade do componente.

trans-unit.source: This ensures that the Properties window will display the property's updated value.
trans-unit.target: Isto garante que a janela Propriedades apresentará o valor da propriedade atualizado.

trans-unit.source: The component that was changed.
trans-unit.target: O componente que foi alterado.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.MemberDescriptor"></xref> that represents the member that was changed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.MemberDescriptor"> </xref> que representa o membro que foi alterado.

trans-unit.source: The old value of the changed member.
trans-unit.target: O valor antigo do membro foi alterado.

trans-unit.source: The new value of the changed member.
trans-unit.target: O novo valor do membro foi alterado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the component that was modified.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o componente que foi modificado.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the component that was modified.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>que representa o componente que foi modificado.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets the member that has been changed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o membro que foi alterado.

trans-unit.source: This property can be `null` if the member is unknown.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade pode ser `null` se o membro é desconhecido.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.MemberDescriptor"></xref> that indicates the member that has been changed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.MemberDescriptor"> </xref> indica que o membro que foi alterado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the new value of the changed member.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o novo valor do membro foi alterado.

trans-unit.source: This property has meaning only if the member is not `null`.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade tem significado apenas se o membro não é `null`.

trans-unit.source: The new value of the changed member.
trans-unit.target: O novo valor do membro foi alterado.

trans-unit.source: This property can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade pode ser <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the old value of the changed member.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor antigo do membro foi alterado.

trans-unit.source: This property has meaning only if the member is not `null`.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade tem significado apenas se o membro não é `null`.

trans-unit.source: The old value of the changed member.
trans-unit.target: O valor antigo do membro foi alterado.

trans-unit.source: This property can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade pode ser <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.
